desc: Probable 1 turn Atk reduction when damage dealt has exceeded certain amount & 20% boost to Atk and max HP

dictionary.lore: A magical gauntlet said to originate from a place called the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado, located in another world. This gauntlet allows the wearer to summon demons freely, but only those chosen by the gauntlet -- known as Samurai -- are able to draw out its power. It also houses a sprite known as Burroughs, who often offers useful advice to its master.

name: Samurai Gauntlet
